publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1436 Mr Mark Ruskell: UCI Mountain Bike World Cup-That the Parliament congratulates the organisers and supporters of the Fort William round of the 2004 UCI Mountain Bike World Cup; further congratulates the BBC on providing televised coverage of the event; welcomes the growing popularity of mountain biking with visitors to Scotland and the bid to bring the World Championships here in 2007, and notes the promotional role of cycle sport as part of a wider cycle culture in Scotland that can help to deliver goals of public health improvement and sustainable transport.

S2M-1436 UCI Mountain Bike World Cup (lodged on 8 June 2004) Fergus Ewing*, Chris Ballance*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mark Ballard*, Jim Mather*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Shiona Baird*, Mary Scanlon*, Eleanor Scott*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Rosie Kane*, Robin Harper*, Mike Pringle*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Bristow Muldoon*

S2M-1436 Mr Mark Ruskell: UCI Mountain Bike World Cup-That the Parliament congratulates the organisers and supporters of the Fort William round of the 2004 UCI Mountain Bike World Cup; further congratulates the BBC on providing televised coverage of the event; welcomes the growing popularity of mountain biking with visitors to Scotland and the bid to bring the World Championships here in 2007, and notes the promotional role of cycle sport as part of a wider cycle culture in Scotland that can help to deliver goals of public health improvement and sustainable transport. Supported by: Fergus Ewing, Chris Ballance, Rob Gibson, Mr Jamie Stone, Mark Ballard, Jim Mather, Bruce Crawford, Mr Brian Monteith, Shiona Baird, Mary Scanlon, Eleanor Scott, Richard Lochhead, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Dr Elaine Murray, Rosie Kane, Robin Harper, Mike Pringle, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Bristow Muldoon
S2M-1436 UCI Mountain Bike World Cup (lodged on 8 June 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-1436 UCI Mountain Bike World Cup (lodged on 8 June 2004) Donald Gorrie*
